devdoc.author: Steer Protocol
devdoc.details: You can use this contract to enumerate strategy and vault details but also create, join, and leave vaultsThis contract is not intended to hold any tokens in between two or more transactions, it only hold tokens transiently within a single transaction and transfers the tokens in the same transaction.This function should be used when doing protocol integrations

deposit(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Deposits tokens in proportion to the vault's current holdings.These tokens sit in the vault and are not used for liquidity on      Uniswap until the next rebalance.

params.amount0Desired: Max amount of token0 to deposit
params.amount0Min: Revert if resulting `amount0` is less than this
params.amount1Desired: Max amount of token1 to deposit
params.amount1Min: Revert if resulting `amount1` is less than this
params.vaultAddress: The address of the vault to deposit to

depositAndStake(address,uint256,uint256,.details: Deposits tokens in proportion to the vault's current holdings and stake the share.These tokens sit in the vault and are not used for liquidity on      Uniswap until the next rebalance.

params.amount0Desired: Max amount of token0 to deposit
params.amount0Min: Revert if resulting `amount0` is less than this
params.amount1Desired: Max amount of token1 to deposit
params.amount1Min: Revert if resulting `amount1` is less than this
params.poolId: The id of the pool in which the share should be staked
params.vaultAddress: The address of the vault to deposit to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setNodeConfig(string).details: Only for ownerSets the config for node

returns._0: The List of strategies created by the creator

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

vaultsByStrategy(uint256).details: Get the vaults using a given strategy

returns._0: The List of vault details using the strategy

devdoc.title: Periphery contract to facilitate common actions on the protocol

nodeConfig().notice: The IPFS reference of the node configuration.
